title: garbhavAsam ariyAda
sahitya:
garbhavAsam ariyAda kaDavuLE karuNaik-kaN pArttaruLE koDiyadOr


anupallavi

  sarpAbharaNam aNindAlum aDiyArkku abhayam tarumen prabhuvE iraivanE


caraNam    vAnantam uyar veLLi malai nAthanE mAlum ayanum tEdum malar pAdanE
Ananda naTarAjanE jyOti vaDivAna bhuvanEshanE unaiyalAl vEru tuNaiyilEn
jaya ponnambalavANa cidambara nAyaka
